SummaryEnglish:
Akira Oono is an ordinary working adult who manages the MMORPG Infinity Game. Fifteen years after creating the game, Oono decides to shut the servers down once and for all. However, as the clock strikes midnight, he somehow finds himself in the body of middle-aged Hakuto Kunai, Infinity Game's Demon Lord!
Soon after his mysterious transportation, he witnesses the demon Greole chasing after a little girl named Aku. Although he effortlessly dispatches the creature, Hakuto is still concerned; after all, he does not remember creating the girl or the demon! Doubting whether he truly is in the world of his creation, Hakuto decides to investigate. Bringing Aku along as his guide and companion, Hakuto sets out on a journey to find out exactly who or what summoned him to this fantasy worldâ€”all while leaving chaos and destruction in his wake.

1.SummaryEnglish: Akira Onno ends up in another world of his own creation where he runs into a filthy girl shunned from her village who ends up calling him Demon Lord.

2.SummaryEnglish: When one of the three Holy Maidens comes to dispatch the Demon Lord, Kunai is forced to resort to some old-fashioned discipline.

3.SummaryEnglish: Luna's wild sister comes to take her away. But when trouble shows up to ruin everything, a new face comes to save the day.

4.SummaryEnglish: Kunai summons one of his underlings who lends Aku a helping hand. But being who it is, they may end up being more than he can handle.

5.SummaryEnglish: On their way to the Holy Capital, the party runs into a small village with big problems and decides to take matters into their own hands.

6.SummaryEnglish: While having a pleasant dinner banquet for Aku in the Holy Capital, the celebration is cut short by a dangerous cult with a thirst for blood.

7.SummaryEnglish: As the Holy Castle comes under attack, the defenders get in over their heads. Kunai opts to send his replacement to take on the troublesome Demon.

8.SummaryEnglish: After investigating the Seraph in the Holy Capital, Kunai and crew jump back to Rabby Village to get his money-making scheme underway.

9.TitleEnglish: Dancing Swindler and the Giant Gold Coin
9.SummaryEnglish: In order to prepare the hot spring resort for business, Kunai earns some much-needed funds by taking advantage of a merchant who doesn't know any better.

10.SummaryEnglish: Luna tries to impress Madam Shrimpfry with a tour of the hot spring resort. Later on, Aku, Luna, Yu, and Tron all compete for Kunai's attention.

11.SummaryEnglish: Kunai falls victim to Yukikaze's attack while on the hunt for information. Meanwhile, Angel takes it upon herself to rescue her little sister.

12.SummaryEnglish: During a surprise confrontation in the outdoor bath, Angel White finds out Kunai may be more than meets the eye.

1.SummaryEnglish: Akira Oono was a game dev who wanted to build his own world, free from corporate oversight. But he had no idea that he'd get dragged into his own creation as Hakuto Kunai, the Demon Lord of the Great Empire! His adventure picks up where it left off!

2.SummaryEnglish: Akira and Kunai reflect on how far the village of Rabby has come, and the prosperity lying ahead of it.

3.SummaryEnglish: Kunai heads to the town of Rookie to farm for magical items in the Prison Labyrinth there. He's accompanied by Mikan and Yukikaze, and sparks are sure to fly.

4.SummaryEnglish: News of Kunai's exploits reaches other nations around the world. How will they respond?

5.SummaryEnglish: Eagle reminisces on her life after being separated from Luna as the situation with her comes to a head. Meanwhile, Kunai gets a surprise visitor with an equally surprising request.

6.SummaryEnglish: Things come to a head as all chaos breaks out around Eagle. Can she be saved?

7.SummaryEnglish: After the chaos dies down, Kunai returns to Organ, and they continue their journey into the Beast Kingdom.

8.SummaryEnglish: Tensions flare up in Xenovia and their neighboring state of Parma as Kunai and gang continue their exploration of Beastkin territory.

9.SummaryEnglish: Kunai and Organ discuss their plans for their attack of Belphegor's castle, while Akane and Mink run off to make their own inroads.

10.SummaryEnglish: Kunai and Organ begin their attack on Belphegor's castle, with Monkeymagic and his troops providing assistance.

11.SummaryEnglish: Two of the remaining assassins target Serizawa and Hajime while the rest of the Miburo hunt down the final culprit. Can they take the whole gang alive? And how will a lord's patronage change the ragtag group?

12.SummaryEnglish: Organ is in trouble, and it us up to Kunai to save the day.
